subject: [Radiance-general] 2010 Workshop Dates
body:
Hi Rob,

Good timing.  Jan & I were just discussing this, and trying to settle
on a final set of dates.  Apparently, there is a conflict with the
original dates suggested for September, as the Bausim-Conference is
taking place in Vienna from the 22nd to the 24th.  The October dates
weren't good for me, either, so Jan suggested Sept. 20-22nd --
overlapping Bausim with an optional third day (Wed.) to cover one or
more special topics.

Anyone have any objections to a Sept. 20-22 schedule for the 2010
workshop?

-Greg
